articles.title: USFL, XFL announce new league name in merger: United Football League
articles.description: The USFL and XFL have merged into the UFL — the new premier spring football league, Dwayne Johnson announced on FOX NFL Sunday.
articles.content:
History was made on New Years Eve, as the United Football League (the "UFL"), the new premier spring football league, was born from the merger of the XFL andUSFL.

articles.title: Video: Police officer seen punching college student outside Ohio bar | CNN
articles.description: An Oxford, Ohio, police officer seen punching a Miami University football player during a November arrest has been placed on administrative leave, and an investigation is underway.
